---
title: "Charts (HC)"
format: dashboard
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
# Initialize dashboardr page configuration (CSS/JS for charts)
dashboardr::.page_config()
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
dashboardr::enable_inputs()
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
# Enable chart export buttons (download as PNG/SVG/PDF/CSV)
dashboardr::enable_chart_export()
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
dashboardr::enable_sidebar()
```

```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| error: false
#| results: 'hide'

# Load dashboardr (includes dplyr, highcharter as dependencies)
library(dashboardr)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Load multiple datasets

# Load data
data <- readRDS('dataset_small_700obs.rds')
cat('data loaded:', nrow(data), 'rows,', ncol(data), 'columns\n')

# Load dataset
dataset <- readRDS('dataset_small_16obs.rds')
cat('dataset loaded:', nrow(dataset), 'rows,', ncol(dataset), 'columns\n')

# Load dataset_2
dataset_2 <- readRDS('dataset_small_4obs.rds')
cat('dataset_2 loaded:', nrow(dataset_2), 'rows,', ncol(dataset_2), 'columns\n')

# Load dataset_3
dataset_3 <- readRDS('dataset_small_12obs.rds')
cat('dataset_3 loaded:', nrow(dataset_3), 'rows,', ncol(dataset_3), 'columns\n')

```

## Trends


::: {.panel-tabset}

### Timeline

```{r trends}
# Timeline
result <- tryCatch({
  viz_timeline(
    data = data,
    title = "Timeline",
    color_palette = NULL,
    weight_var = NULL,
    time_var = "year",
    y_var = "score",
    group_var = "gender",
    cross_tab_filter_vars = c("region", "education", "year")
  )
}, error = function(e) {
  stop("Visualization failed ('Timeline', type 'timeline'): ", conditionMessage(e), call. = FALSE)
})

result <- dashboardr:::.embed_cross_tab(result)

result
```


### Stacked Bar %

```{r trends-2}
# Stacked Bar %
result <- tryCatch({
  viz_stackedbar(
    data = data,
    title = "Stacked Bar %",
    color_palette = NULL,
    weight_var = NULL,
    x_var = "region",
    stack_var = "happiness",
    stacked_type = "percent",
    cross_tab_filter_vars = c("region", "education", "year")
  )
}, error = function(e) {
  stop("Visualization failed ('Stacked Bar %', type 'stackedbar'): ", conditionMessage(e), call. = FALSE)
})

result <- dashboardr:::.embed_cross_tab(result)

result
```
